summary: Bruce Week Day 2: Confession/Cold “You feeling better big guy? Hungry? Cold?“  “No, because our friendship warms me. I just...
caption:
Bruce Week Day 2: Confession/Cold

“You feeling better big guy? Hungry? Cold?“

“No, because our friendship warms me. I just decided to freeze my butt for laughs.“

“Love you too Brucie bear. Come on, get up. You can get my jacket.”

“Thanks Tony.”

“I just want you to know that your confession warms me too.”

“Shut up smart ass.”

title: Fix Me Up
body:
Fandom: Marvel

Pairing: Billy Russo x Reader

Prompt #1015

“I feel like a wimp saying I need a hug.”

“You’re not a wimp, come here.”

You sat on the bed explaining your situation. You were walking home from hanging out at the bar with Karen, Matt, and Foggy. It was just you and Karen and out of nowhere, a guy comes up behind Karen. He held a knife to her throat and threatened to slice her if you and she didn’t give him your bags.

You were going to comply, frightened for you friend’s life. However, Karen came out of nowhere with elbowing the guy in the gut and kicking him back. You decided to assist her and threw in some of the moves Billy taught you. The guy wasn’t easy to take down and he definitely gave you a fight.

“-and so he swung but he missed. Then I swung and I missed and hit the wall. Karen ended up knocking him out with a plank of wood she found in an alleyway. So that’s why I look like this. And even after all that I feel like a wimp saying I need a hug.”

Billy’s hard expression withered away for a fond smile to take its place, “You’re not a wimp, come here.” 

You stood up and walked over to him. He cupped your face and examined the bruises and cuts, “It doesn’t feel bad,” you murmured.

“Hm, yeah, but it looks bad. You’re gonna have to use a lot of that concealer of yours to hide this shiner on your cheek.” his thumb softly glided over the red skin, splotches of purple starting to appear already. Billy then wraps his arm around you, “I’m just glad you’re safe.”

Your face rested in his chest, “I told you I’ll need more self-defense lessons.”

Billy pulled away, eyes softened, and he lets out a sigh, “I suppose you’re right, but right now you need a warm bath and an ice pack.” he left to run the bath while you got yourself an ice pack. 

When you entered the bathroom, the bath was halfway full, a bath bomb diffusing in the water causing it to change and bubbles to form. You undressed with Billy’s help and you two slowly inserted yourselves into the warm water. 

You leaned against Billy’s chest as he held the ice pack to your face, “You know,” he spoke up, “I hate that you went through this, but I’m really glad you were able to fight back.” he kissed your head, “My little fighter.”

You smiled to yourself, “Maybe you’ll teach me how to shoot a gun soon?”

He scoffed, “Don’t get ahead of yourself, baby. One defense lesson at a time.”

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: just a drop of water in an endless sea
title: just a drop of water in an endless sea
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QWcqsv

by delveintoiridescence

“I know how it feels, after the battle,” Tony says, his voice rendered to barely a whisper. “You see things, monsters, whatever—it’s surreal. Just a big adventure. But then—” his voice breaks. “People get hurt. People die. And afterward… any reminder of it can send you in a downward spiral real bad, real quick.”

Tony sniffs—no, he’s not crying, stop asking—and looks Peter in the eye.

“You’re just a kid,” he says, continuing quickly before the seventeen-year-old can protest. “You’ve got a whole life ahead of you. I just—I didn’t want those painful reminders to turn you into a mess.”

Like me.

(or: Thanos is gone. The war is over. But the memories—they’ll stay. Forever. And Tony is determined to never let the kid get hurt again.)

Words: 3877, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Friday (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Angst, Precious Peter Parker, Iron Dad, spider son, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Father-Son Relationship, not that Tony will ever admit that, Hugs, Platonic Relationships, Protective Tony Stark


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QWcqsv

title: The Other Covenant
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2xDfYrm

by MissZayla

After Chase Collins ‘disappears’ the boys go back to a semi-normal life. When Chase starts to wreck havoc again the boys realize they are not the only Covenant out there. And one of the new guys looks identical to Chase.

Words: 671, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Covenant (2006), Marvel Cinematic Universe

  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence

title: mcu as things i hear at school
body:
peter: okay, concept: unicorns actually used their horns to drink

tony: peter, for the last time, unicorns are not just prehistoric dinosaur horses
